attributes.description: Balance of 5 year / unlimited Mileage Kai warranty, Balance of 5 year / 90 000 kms Kia service plan, KIA PINETOWN we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre- Owned vehicles, belonging to a multinational company who is South Africa's biggest motor group which owns 340 dealers country wide. All our vehicles have to pass a DEKRA Condition Report, DEKRA roadworthy certificate and an 125 point  quality check at our workshop for your peace of mind motoring. We will tailor make a finance package that will suit your pocket. Kia Pinetown can offer extended warranties and service plans on all vehicles. Trade in's accepted and nationwide delivery can be arranged, call now, one of our Sales executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you with a warm cup of coffee at our dealership

attributes.description: THE NEW T8 2.0 CTi DOUBLE CAB IS HERE THIS IS THE MOST EXCITING PRODUCT TO HIT THE SA MARKET IN A VERY LONG TIME. In my opinion, the Chinese manufacturers are now where the Koreans were 10 years ago when they launched the new generation KIA SPORTAGE and HYUNDAI IX35. They were making a good quality product at an affordable price. The Koreans are still making a good product but the price is no longer so affordable with their entry level S.U.Vs selling for over R400 000. Enter the JAC. It is just such a GOOD LOOKING BAKKIE ALL THE MODERN FEATURES AND LUXURIES INCLUDING TOUCH SCREEN INFOTAINMENT WITH FULLY INTEGRATED SMART PHONE CONNECTIVITY AND FULL LEATHER PACKAGE. Additional standard extras include Side steps, Roll bar, Rubberized bin etc. etc. Just such a beautiful looking DOUBLE CAB. Make no mistake, the build quality and overall feel of this vehicle is also brilliant. WITH NOW OVER 60 DEALERS COUNTRYWIDE AND GROWING , JAC IS HERE TO STAY. The bakkie comes with a 5 YEAR 60 000KM SERVICE PLAN AND A 5 YEAR150 000 KM factory warranty which equals 100 peace of mind motoring We have a fully accredited JAC workshop on site to cater for all your parts and maintenance needs. IMPOSSIBLE TO FIND A BETTER DOUBLE CAB AVAILABLE IN THIS PRICE RANGE. must be seen and driven to be appreciated. Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security AA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE

attributes.description: Subject to price increase and stock availabilIty now at Haval Bruma, The P- Series is available in 2.0 Turbo Diesel, the powerplant delivers 120kW and 400 Nm of torque, Auto ZF 8 Speed Transmission and 6 speed manual transmission. The P Series is described in South Africa by one simple word of more. More space, more design appeal, more intelligent technologies, more luxury, comfort and convenience, more quality, more durability, more reliability and more safety. The entire range of P series bakkies have high safety levels, Airbags feature on all models and vary from 2 airbags on base models up to 7 airbags in the top specification. Vehicle stability and traction control is standard across the range as well as hill hold assist. Park distance control is standard on all models and as you go up in the range you go from reverse camera to a full 360 view in the higher spec.

attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.
